description:
First Story arc of the Dragon Ball GT anime.

10 years have passed since Goku and Uub left their friends and families to train in order to hone their skills to perfection. But Goku soon finds himself helpless against the mystical power of the Dragon balls and an accidental wish made by the devious Emperor Pilaf. His desire; that Goku once again become a child!

Not daunted by this small setback, Goku, together with the new president of Capsule Corporation, Trunks, and his own granddaughter, Pan, blast off into the outer reaches of space in search of the mysterious Blackstar Dragon balls. But these Dragon balls have a fatal secret: if not collected within 1 year the planet on which the last wish was made will be destroyed. The current target: Mother Earth herself!
name: Black Star Dragon Ball Saga

deck: The Oracion Seis arc is the ninth story arc of the Fairy Tail series. It is considered a sequel to the Tower of Heaven arc in which Jellal survives his fusing with the etherion (a magical weapon belonging to the magic council) but at the cost of losing his memory. Members of the Oracion Seis are former slaves at the Tower of Heaven. The main antagonist of the arc is Oracion Seis guild master, Zero.
description: First story arc in the second seaon of the anime Fairy Tail.
name: Oracin Seis arc

description: The second story arc in the second season of the Fairy Tail anime.
name: Daphne Arc

description: Harley Quinn and Poison Ivy, two Gotham City supervillains, call on Mystery Inc. when they think they've been cursed by a relic they stole.
name: Gotham Ghouls
